mapper.insert: insert into share_board (user_id, title, content, image_name, plan_id) values (#{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image_name}, #{plan_id})
insert into share_plan (plan_id, user_id, total_date) values (#{plan_id}, #{user_id}, #{total_date})

insert into share_place (plan_id, visit_google_id, display_name, latitude, longitude, address, phone_number, visit_date, visit_order) values (#{plan_id}, #{id}, #{displayName}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{formattedAddress}, #{internationalPhoneNumber}, #{date}, #{order})
mapper.select: select post_id, user_id, plan_id, title, content, created_time, modified_time, image_name from share_board order by post_id
